salesforce_client.description: Client object that will be used for getting available fields for each object and as an inside client for salesforce_bulk_client.

salesforce_bulk_client.description: Client object that will be used for bulk downloading the Salesforce data.

salesforce_objects.description: List of salesforce objects to be downloaded. All available fields are downloaded.

salesforce_created_from.description: If passed, only objects created from the date are downloaded from salesforce.

salesforce_created_to.description: If passed, only objects created until the date are downloaded from salesforce.

salesforce_single_batch.description: If value passed the Salesforce data are downloaded in a single batch as opposed to multiple parallel batches. Might be significanlty faster for small data and not working for big data.

GDC_LOGGER.description: If passed the log messages will be logged using the logger.
